titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on 2,5-thiophenediybis(5-tert-butyl-1,3-benzoxazole).

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 4/22/2004--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2007, the duty on 2,5-thiophenediybis(5-tert-butyl-1,3-benzoxazole).
